summary: This document is a chain of internal FBI emails from October 2020 concerning logistical coordination for a survivor briefing related to the Epstein case. The emails focus on finalizing and distributing invitations and RSVP questionnaires to victims and their attorneys, and managing a master contact list.

persons.name: Young, N.
persons.role: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
persons.context: FBI Special Agent involved in coordinating the survivor briefing, confirming victim representation details.

persons.name: Bob Josefsberg
persons.context: Attorney representing multiple victims; the FBI is waiting for his current client list to facilitate invitation distribution.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.context: Attorney representing a victim, as noted by Special Agent Young.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist providing a list of clients and working to obtain the most recent list from attorney Bob Josefsberg.

persons.name: Stauss
persons.role: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: FBI Program Manager coordinating the briefing logistics, requesting updates on invitation distribution numbers.

connections.description: Henderson is working to obtain a current client list from attorney Josefsberg for the briefing invitations.
Special Agent Young references Josefsberg as representing multiple victims and is involved in confirming representation details.
Special Agent Young notes that a victim is represented by attorney Glassman.

events.title: Planned Survivor Briefing
events.description: A meeting/briefing for victims/survivors of the Epstein case was being organized by the FBI and DOJ, with invitations sent in late October 2020.

keyFacts: The FBI's Victim Services Division was organizing a survivor briefing for November 12, 2020, related to the Epstein case.
Approximately 13 listed victims lacked contact information, and invitations were sent to 14 attorneys, 6 victims directly, and a family member of a deceased victim.
Attorney Bob Josefsberg represented multiple victims, and the FBI was coordinating with his office and Victim Specialist Brittany Henderson to obtain client lists.
The email chain highlights the logistical challenges and careful coordination required to contact and communicate with victims and their legal representatives.
The correspondence is marked as internal FBI communication with strict confidentiality notices regarding Personally Identifiable Information (PII).
